description.value:
When you reach 3rd level, you can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class if you do not already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells do not count against the number of ranger spells you know.

Primal Awareness Spells
Ranger LevelSpell
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.f5R5p8d5C0JvLTba]{Speak with Animals}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.27xIP3ivHfpKkUop]{Beast Sense}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.w7dp81BTqLVjcclf]{Speak with Plants}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.bSAkTwoopss0JbV3]{Locate Creature}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.K0f8PDezkFVNeA4F]{Commune with Nature}

You can cast each of these spells once without expending a spell slot. Once you cast a spell in this way, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
